tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following types of lava flows results when a volcano erupts underwater?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Pahoehoe lava
X) A’a lava
Y) Pillow lava
Z) Block lava
bonus_question: -   –  In which city would you be able to see cirrus clouds at an altitude of 3,000 meters above the surface?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Ft. Lauderdale, Florida
X) Honolulu, Hawaii
Y) Barrow, Alaska
Z) New York, New York
